title: Energy - energy dissipated by air resistance

content.question: Which of the following is most nearly the change in kinetic energy of the rock from time <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mstyle></math> to time <math alttext="t equals t sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math> ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
